text.0: arayi oneeyed limping hag fly everscreeching to the hill.
text.1: we frighten thee away with these the heroes of sirimbitha.
text.2: scared from this place and that is she destroyer of each germ unborn.
text.3: go sharphorned brāhmaṇaspti and drive arayi far away.
text.4: yon log that floats without a man to guide it on the rivers edge.
text.5: seize it thou thing with hideous jaws and go thou far away thereon.
text.6: when foul with secret stain and spot ye hastened onward to the breast.
text.7: all indras enemies were slain and passed away like froth and foam.
text.8: these men have led about the cow have duly carried agni round.
text.9: and raised their glory tg the gods who will attack them with success.
